description: Cross-platform network file transfer NitroShare simplifies the task of sending files from one device to another on a local network. * Automatic peer discovery * Support for transferring multiple files and folders * Transfers optimized for maximum bandwidth utilization * Compatible with the NitroShare desktop application * Light and dark theme * Fully open source and completely free of ads and trackers Files can be sent directly from the app itself or using the share menu from within other applications. The desktop application is available at the homepage.
